name: Glem (Text to lemmatize)
description: GLEM is a lemmatizer for Ancient Greek.
location: Faculty of Philosophy, Theology and Religious Studies and Centre for Language and Speech Technology, Radboud University Nijmegen
creators: Corien Bary, Peter Berck, Iris Hendrickx, Wessel Stoop (Faculty of Philosophy, Theology and Religious Studies and Centre for Language and Speech Technology, Radboud University Nijmegen)
